description.brief: Physical resilience, endurance, and bodily conditioning
description.detailed: Constitution represents disciplined conditioning of the body, resilience to harm, and sustained performance under pressure. High Constitution resists status effects, endures longer in combat, and supports heavier protection.
description.visual_manifestation: Tempered physique, steady breath, golden resilience aura

primary_effects: Boosts effectiveness with heavy armor and guards

damage_type_integration.damage_synergy: Metal and fortification effects scale with Constitution
